folder: Pier 30 - South Street - Market and Pike slips - [Manhattan Bridge]., Manhattan, NY
text:
(1)
East River, showing pier 30, off South Street, between Market and Pike Slips. The upper story of the pier is for recreational purposes for children of the neighborhood. On the left is visible a portion of the Manhattan Bridge.

April 15, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, at a later date.

October 14, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) Same
title: East River - Manhattan - Pier 30 - South Street - Market and Pike slips - [Manhattan Bridge].
